Author: Flint#6435
Content:
@Deleted User  Of course, there is a solution - this is a positive experience of introducing the blockchain into the state system! And countries such as Switzerland, Malta, Georgia, Belarus - an excellent example of how to legalize cryptocurrencies at the national government level in a short time - increase both the investment attractiveness of these countries and the efficiency of the blockchain in the current economic trend to become autonomous without the human factor from which millions of dollars are lost every year from the budget! Code is law! Here is the creed of the new digital age! the rest of the states conducting strict regulation will be noncompetitive in the new economy of the Internet of things of the artificial Internet and the blockchain! And no China and others will stop it! People soon realize the advantages of these technologies over the outdated Fintechs of the 20th century! And most of all, countries with cheap renewable energy will win! Iceland is a good example of the introduction of mining built on geothermal energy - and a positive shift is already visible! Central banks will not be needed! An artificial intelligence machine will not trust the intermediary represented by the bank to interact with another machine - this is not effective!
The only thing with which there will be some time to fight is anonymous cryptocurrency! But this will end when the millenial generation takes over the world!

Content: no need, but maybe not a bad idea

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is a good practice to rotate passwords in general, something that exists for years has years to be compromised. something that is brand new has no such long time window. but this is just generic advice

Author: Coin2stable#1872
Content: @jl777c  I have a few questions about how fees earned for mm2 will be converted .    1. Which exchanges will be used for conversion , CEX or DEX( mm2)       2. Will this be done on bulk all at once a buy wall  ? or periodically .                                              3.  Or will it be an active buy  action in which all sell orders are filled , which will spike the price up ?     4. Will there be news on the time in which orders will be  are placed to prevent front running by insiders including you and close team.  (Buying KMD before hand and then placing the  optimum highest sell order in which initially bought KMD will be filled when all the fees is converted all at once potentially making easy money with insider knowledge among the team or group , also members within the  insider group can all front run each other) .  Your thought thanks
